mapper.select: select n_no, n_title, n_content, n_date ,n_writer, n_file, n_grade, n_hit from notice
mapper.insert: insert into question(q_no, q_title, q_content, q_email, q_writer) values('QN'||to_char(systimestamp + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR),'YYMMDDFF3')||dbms_random.string('x',3) , #{q_title}, #{q_content}, #{q_email}, #{q_writer})
